title: $63+ O/W United Fall, Winter Flights on Sale Through Thursday
text:
$63+ O/W United Fall, Winter Flights on Sale Through Thursday $63+ O/W United Fall, Winter Flights on Sale Through Thursday September 2, 2015 12:37pm   
United has discounted fall and winter flights to dozens of domestic destinations; including Chicago, Los Angeles, Newark, and Washington, D.C., among dozens of other cities. The sale is valid through Thursday, September 3; and tickets must be booked at least 14 days in advance. Flights start at $63 one-way ($126 round-trip). 
Travel on most routes is valid any day except Fridays or Sundays during September 8 - March 9. Blackout dates prohibit travel on September 7; November 24, 25, 28, 29, 30 ... more 
United has discounted fall and winter flights to dozens of domestic destinations; including Chicago, Los Angeles, Newark, and Washington, D.C., among dozens of other cities. The sale is valid through Thursday, September 3; and tickets must be booked at least 14 days in advance. Flights start at $63 one-way ($126 round-trip). 
Travel on most routes is valid any day except Fridays or Sundays during September 8 - March 9. Blackout dates prohibit travel on September 7; November 24, 25, 28, 29, 30; December 1, 26 - 28; January 2, 3; or on February 11, 15, or 16. United requires a Saturday-night overstay.   The best prices were found for   these sales   these promotions on United 's sale page. Pros:
